name: Blood & Plunder
description:
Description from the publisher:

Brandish your cutlass and musket, and prepare for swashbuckling and adventure on the Spanish Main! Whether you're marching your pirate army across the Isthmus of Panama as legendary pirate Henry Morgan or terrorizing the Jamaican coasts as the infamous Captain Rivero, Blood & Plunder is a game set in the caribbean during the 17th century that is guaranteed to evoke thrills and capture the imagination of miniature gamers. This 30mm miniatures game boasts:


     A compelling and intuitive rule set 
     The highest quality models of its genre 
     Masterfully crafted mechanics which allow for seamless transition between land and naval battles
     Endless scenario possibilities 
     Consultation from world renowned historian and author Bennerson Little (Black Sails, Fortune's Whelp) to ensure that all models, campaigns and strategies reflect the period
